# Write your Blog content 10x faster

 **Never stare at a blank page again**  
From generating your next article idea to writing in-depth paragraphs, the AI
Writer can help you create content on semi-autopilot.

1.

You found a keyword. Now let’s write content to rank for it

Create content in as little as 7 minutes using Artificial Intelligence

2.

Select the title & intro paragraph of your content piece

Select from our AI-generated list of title ideas that are designed to rank on
Google

3.

Add headings to your content outline and we’ll do the magic

Based on the headings you select from our outline ideas, we’ll automatically
write all the content for you
